description: John Brunetti Sr., owner of Hialeah Park, revived the famed track with quarter horse racing and a casino, and he hopes thoroughbreds will follow.
title: A Fabled Track Tries to Come Back
title_page: A Fabled Track Tries to Come Back - The New York Times
maintext:
Slide 1 of 8,
John Brunetti is 83, which makes him slightly younger than Hialeah Park, which he owns. He relaxed as quarter horses headed to the racetrack for one of the afternoon races last month.
